trans-unit.source: This class helps resolve proxy types that were created for [persistence-ignorant](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3) data classes to the actual types of persistence-ignorant objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类可帮助解决为创建的代理类型[持久性未知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)为持久性未知对象的实际类型的数据类。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyDataContractResolver class is used with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ProxyDataContractResolver"></xref> class.

During deserialization, maps any <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> information to the actual type of the [persistence-ignorant](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3) object.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间映射任何<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>信息写入的实际类型[持久性未知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see: [Working with POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅︰[使用 POCO 实体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> information to map.
The namespace of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type that the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> is mapped to.
trans-unit.target: 返回的类型<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>映射到。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no known type was found that matches the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有已知的类型找到的匹配<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: During serialization, maps actual types to <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: 序列化期间，将映射到的实际类型<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see: [Working with POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅︰[使用 POCO 实体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)。

trans-unit.source: The actual type of the persistence-ignorant object.
trans-unit.target: 持久性未知对象的实际类型。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a list of <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref> declarations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含的列表<xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:type" name="xsi:type" href=""></xref>声明。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a list of namespaces used.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含使用的命名空间的列表。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type was resolved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该类型已解析;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
